metadata.title: CVE-2024-27029 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: fix mmhub client id out-of-bounds accessProperly handle cid 0x140.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
